domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Sure, if you consider 25, 236 deaths to be winning.  That number would be much lower had you been serious about  COVID-19 rather than obsess about your popularity, your re-election campaign, your meanness, what fresh batch of lies and how you might stir up a new pot of shit.
